sentence.text: The most significant association with childhood brain tumor risk was for IVS1-401G>C in the AICDA gene [odds ratio (OR) = 2.8; 95% confidence interval (95%CI) = 1.25-6.46]; the polymorphism *9276A>C of epidermis development was associated with decreased brain tumor risk (OR = 0.4; 95%CI = 0.19-0.95).
We concluded that genetic polymorphisms in AICDA and epidermis development are associated with risk for brain tumor in Korean children.
